rules.name: myRule_5
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ((2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6 AND 7))
rules.label: Delivery Enquiry Security Notification

Flow.description: This process will send an automated email once criterion was satisfied. It sends email after creating Delivery Enquiry Case for BSC and Non-BSC Customers.

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Delivery Enquiry', [Case].Send_Auto_Response_Email__c, NOT([Case].Auto_Email_Response_sent__c), OR( ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Email'), ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Web')), [Case].SuppliedEmail <> null, NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c), LOWER([Case].SuppliedEmail))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c), LOWER(RIGHT([Case].SuppliedEmail, LEN([Case].SuppliedEmail) - FIND("@", [Case].SuppliedEmail))))), NOT([Case].Business_Solutions_Customer__c))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} = 'Delivery Enquiry', {!myVariable_current.Send_Auto_Response_Email__c}, NOT({!myVariable_current.Auto_Email_Response_sent__c}), OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Email'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Web')), {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail} <> null, NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c}), LOWER({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c}), LOWER(RIGHT({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, LEN({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}) - FIND("@", {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))))), NOT({!myVariable_current.Business_Solutions_Customer__c}))

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Transit Warranty Claim', ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Web'), [Case].SuppliedEmail <> null, NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c), LOWER([Case].SuppliedEmail))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c), LOWER(RIGHT([Case].SuppliedEmail, LEN([Case].SuppliedEmail) - FIND("@", [Case].SuppliedEmail))))))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} = 'Transit Warranty Claim', ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Web'), {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail} <> null, NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c}), LOWER({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c}), LOWER(RIGHT({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, LEN({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}) - FIND("@", {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))))))

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Credit Dispute Claim', [Case].Send_Auto_Response_Email__c, NOT([Case].Auto_Email_Response_sent__c), OR(ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Email'),ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Web')), [Case].SuppliedEmail <> null, NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c), LOWER([Case].SuppliedEmail))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c), LOWER(RIGHT([Case].SuppliedEmail, LEN([Case].SuppliedEmail) - FIND("@", [Case].SuppliedEmail))))))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} = 'Credit Dispute Claim', {!myVariable_current.Send_Auto_Response_Email__c}, NOT({!myVariable_current.Auto_Email_Response_sent__c}), OR(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Email'),ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Web')), {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail} <> null, NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c}), LOWER({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c}), LOWER(RIGHT({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, LEN({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}) - FIND("@", {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))))))

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Credit Dispute Claim', ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, 'Closed'), PRIORVALUE([Case].Status) != 'Pending Customer Notification', ISCHANGED([Case].Status), ISPICKVAL([Case].Enquiry_Type__c, 'Dispute Claim'), ISPICKVAL([Case].ResolutionCode__c , 'Request Actioned'), [Case].SuppliedEmail <> null)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_15
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} = 'Credit Dispute Claim', ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, 'Closed'), PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status}) != 'Pending Customer Notification', ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Enquiry_Type__c}, 'Dispute Claim'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.ResolutionCode__c} , 'Request Actioned'), {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail} <> null)

value.stringValue: AND( [Case].Case_RecordType_Name__c = 'Delivery Enquiry', [Case].Send_Auto_Response_Email__c, NOT([Case].Auto_Email_Response_sent__c), OR( ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Email'), ISPICKVAL([Case].Origin, 'Web')), [Case].SuppliedEmail <> null, NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS([Case].SuppliedEmail, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c), LOWER([Case].SuppliedEmail))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER($Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c), LOWER(RIGHT([Case].SuppliedEmail, LEN([Case].SuppliedEmail) - FIND("@", [Case].SuppliedEmail))))), [Case].Business_Solutions_Customer__c)

formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Case_RecordType_Name__c} = 'Delivery Enquiry', {!myVariable_current.Send_Auto_Response_Email__c}, NOT({!myVariable_current.Auto_Email_Response_sent__c}), OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Email'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Origin}, 'Web')), {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail} <> null, NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'noreply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'no-reply')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'postmaster')), NOT(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, 'mailer-daemon')), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Blacklisted_Sender_Email_Addresses__c}), LOWER({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))), NOT(CONTAINS( LOWER({!$Setup.StarTrack_Settings__c.Domains_Excluded_From_Auto_Response__c}), LOWER(RIGHT({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}, LEN({!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}) - FIND("@", {!myVariable_current.SuppliedEmail}))))), {!myVariable_current.Business_Solutions_Customer__c})

Flow.label: StarTrack Outbound Email Alert
